{{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Bucca of the Marish | image=Liz Danforth - Bucca.jpg | caption="Bucca" by [[Liz Danforth]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles=[[Thain]] | position= | location=The [[Marish]] | affiliation= | language= | birth= | birthlocation= | rule=from {{SR|379}} | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Bucca of the Marish''' was the first [[Thain]] of the [[Hobbits]] in [[Eriador]]. ==History== Around {{SR|379}}, some four years after the fall of the [[Arnor|North-kingdom]], the Hobbits of [[the Shire]] elected from their midst one Bucca of the [[Marish]] as the first Thain. He was to rule the land in the [[King of Arthedain|King]]'s stead. Little else is known about him, other than that he brought peace and prosperity to the Hobbits.{{App|TA}} His family became the [[Oldbucks]] and eventually the [[Brandybuck Family|Brandybucks]]. ==Etymology== The word '''Bucca''' is [[Old English]] for "buck", "male deer" or "he-goat" which is a translation of the original [[Westron]] name '''[[Gamba]]'''.{{HM|N}} {{references}} {{seq-start}} {{seq-head | race=hobbit | house=[[Oldbuck Family]] | born=Before {{SR|379}} | died=After {{SR|379}} }} {{Seq | pvac = None | prev=New title | list=1st [[Thain]] of [[The Shire]] | dates={{SR|379}} - unknown | nvac=Unknown | next=Next known:
[[Gorhendad Oldbuck]] }} {{seq-end}} {{thains}} [[Category:Brandybuck]] [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Oldbuck]] [[Category:Thains]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Bucca]] [[fi:Bucca Nevalainen]] [[fr:encyclo:personnages:hobbits:bucca du maresque]]
